    • Method Detail

      • score

        @Deprecated
public float score​(ISourceFile mainFile,
                   ISourceFile referenceFile,
                   java.util.List<ICodeBlockGroup> mutualGroups)
        Deprecated.
        Returns the total similarity score between the 2 passed files

        WARNING: This currently returns a total of ALL matches between the two files, it does not ignore those considered common and removed from final scoring groups. In future this issue will be resolved

        Parameters:
        mainFile - the subject of the scoring function.
        referenceFile - the reference to score the subject against
        mutualGroups - the ICodeBlockGroups where both the main and subject files are present
        Returns:
        Total similarity score for all relevant file match pairs

      • newGroup

        public void newGroup()
        Resets/Initialises the group info storage for each match group.

      • add

        public void add​(NgramMatch pair)
        Adds files and their score info to the group data structure.

        Builds a list of all files (file_list) and adds each pair that is in that file

        Parameters:
        pair - The pair of files and their local match score.

      • checkSize

        public boolean checkSize​(int file_count,
                         java.util.ArrayList<NgramMatch> list)
        Check if the set of files is enough to be considered "common".
        Parameters:
        file_count - The number of files the system is comparing.
        Returns:
        A boolean saying if the file group should be ignored or not.

      • addScoredBlock

        public void addScoredBlock​(ISourceFile file,
                           ICodeBlockGroup out_group)
        Adds a block for the current file to the current groups output data structure along with its score.
        Parameters:
        file - The file that's block is being referenced.
        out_group - The current block groups output structure.
